name: Spectral Spelunker
description:
Spectral Spelunker is a short 2D platformer made in 48 hours for Pizza Jam.

Unfortunately, no sound at the moment, and fullscreen will not work in the browser.

Controls:

  • Movement - Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Jump - Up or W
  • Take Flight - Hold Space in mid-air
  • Pause - Escape
